Title: Winnie-the-Pooh
Writer: A.A. Milne (books), Boris Zakhoder (screenplay), Fyodor Khitruk (screenplay)
Actors: Evgeniy Leonov, Iya Savvina, Vladimir Osenev
Plot: A Soviet version of Winnie-the-Pooh. His first adventure is a desperate attempt to get to honey in a bee hollow. He is ready to take decisive action.
